com.feilong.core.bean

Class PropertyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.bean.PropertyUtil

  • public final class PropertyUtil
extends Object
    封装了 PropertyUtils.

    PropertyUtils与 BeanUtils:

    PropertyUtils类和 BeanUtils类很多的方法在参数上都是相同的,但返回值不同。 
    BeanUtils着重于"Bean",返回值通常是String,
    而PropertyUtils着重于属性,它的返回值通常是Object。 

    Version:
    1.0.8 2014-7-21 17:45:30
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    PropertyUtils, BeanUtil

    • Method Summary

      从指定的 Object obj中,查找指定类型的值.
      static <T> T getProperty(Object bean, String propertyName)
      使用 PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String) 类从对象中取得属性值.
      static void setProperty(Object bean, String propertyName, Object value)
      使用 PropertyUtils.setProperty(Object, String, Object) 来设置属性值(不会进行类型转换).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • copyProperties

        public static void copyProperties(Object toObj,
                                  Object fromObj,
                                  String... includePropertyNames)
        对象值的复制 fromObj-->toObj.

        注意:这种copy都是浅拷贝,复制后的2个Bean的同一个属性可能拥有同一个对象的ref, 这个在使用时要小心,特别是对于属性为自定义类的情况 .

        注意点:

        1. 如果传入的includePropertyNames,含有 fromObj没有的属性名字,将会抛出异常
        2. 如果传入的includePropertyNames,含有 fromObj有,但是 toObj没有的属性名字,可以正常运行,see BeanUtilsBean.copyProperty(Object, String, Object) Line391
        3. 对于Date类型,不需要先注册converter

        使用示例:

                User oldUser = new User();
        oldUser.setId(5L);
        oldUser.setMoney(new BigDecimal(500000));
        oldUser.setDate(new Date());
        String[] nickName = { "feilong", "飞天奔月", "venusdrogon" };
        oldUser.setNickName(nickName);

        User newUser = new User();

        String[] strs = { "date", "money", "nickName" };
        PropertyUtil.copyProperties(newUser, oldUser, strs);
        LOGGER.info(JsonUtil.format(newUser));s(enterpriseSales,enterpriseSales_form,new String[]{"enterpriseName","linkMan","phone"});

 
 返回 :
 
 {
        "userAddresseList": [],
        "userAddresses": [],
        "date": "2015-09-06 13:27:43",
        "password": "",
        "id": 0,
        "nickName":         [
            "feilong",
            "飞天奔月",
            "venusdrogon"
        ],
        "age": 0,
        "name": "feilong",
        "money": 500000,
        "attrMap": null,
        "userInfo": {"age": 0},
        "loves": []
    }

        BeanUtils.copyProperties(Object, Object)与 PropertyUtils.copyProperties(Object, Object)区别

        • BeanUtils.copyProperties(Object, Object)能给不同的两个成员变量相同的,但类名不同的两个类之间相互赋值
        • PropertyUtils.copyProperties(Object, Object) 提供类型转换功能,即发现两个JavaBean的同名属性为不同类型时,在支持的数据类型范围内进行转换,而前者不支持这个功能,但是速度会更快一些.
        • commons-beanutils v1.9.0以前的版本 BeanUtils不允许对象的属性值为 null,PropertyUtils可以拷贝属性值 null的对象.
          (注:commons-beanutils v1.9.0+修复了这个情况,BeanUtilsBean.copyProperties() no longer throws a ConversionException for null properties of certain data types),具体信息,可以参阅commons-beanutils的 RELEASE-NOTES.txt
        Parameters:
        toObj - 目标对象
        fromObj - 原始对象
        includePropertyNames - 包含的属性数组名字数组,(can be nested/indexed/mapped/combo)
        如果 是null or empty ,将会调用 PropertyUtils.copyProperties(Object, Object)
        Since:
        1.4.1
        See Also:
        setProperty(Object, String, Object), BeanUtil.copyProperties(Object, Object, String...), PropertyUtilsBean.copyProperties(Object, Object), Bean复制的几种框架性能比较(Apache BeanUtils、PropertyUtils,Spring BeanUtils,Cglib BeanCopier)

      • describe

        public static Map<String,Object> describe(Object bean)
        返回一个bean中所有的 可读属性,并将属性名/属性值放入一个Map中.

        另外还有一个名为class的属性,属性值是Object的类名,事实上class是java.lang.Object的一个属性

        原理:

        1. 取到bean class的 PropertyDescriptor数组
        2. 循环,找到 PropertyDescriptor.getReadMethod()
        3. 将 name and PropertyUtilsBean.getProperty(Object, String) 设置到map中
        Parameters:
        bean - Bean whose properties are to be extracted
        Returns:
        The set of properties for the bean
        See Also:
        BeanUtils.describe(Object), PropertyUtils.describe(Object), BeanUtil.describe(Object)

      • setProperty

        public static void setProperty(Object bean,
                               String propertyName,
                               Object value)
        使用 PropertyUtils.setProperty(Object, String, Object) 来设置属性值(不会进行类型转换).
        Parameters:
        bean - Bean whose property is to be modified
        propertyName - Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified
        value - Value to which this property is to be set
        See Also:
        BeanUtils.setProperty(Object, String, Object), PropertyUtils.setProperty(Object, String, Object), BeanUtil.setProperty(Object, String, Object)

      • getProperty

        public static <T> T getProperty(Object bean,
                                String propertyName)
        使用 PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String) 类从对象中取得属性值.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        bean - Bean whose property is to be extracted
        propertyName - Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be extracted
        Returns:
        使用PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String) 从对象中取得属性值
        See Also:
        BeanUtil.getProperty(Object, String), BeanUtils.getProperty(Object, String), PropertyUtils.getProperty(Object, String), PropertyUtilsBean

      • findValueOfType

        public static <T> T findValueOfType(Object obj,
                                    Class<T> toBeFindedClassType)
        从指定的 Object obj中,查找指定类型的值.

        代码流程:

        1. if ClassUtil.isInstance(findValue, toBeFindedClassType) 直接返回 findValue
        2. 自动过滤isPrimitiveOrWrapper,CharSequence,Collection,Map类型
        3. 调用 describe(Object) 再递归查找
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        obj - 要被查找的对象
        toBeFindedClassType - the to be finded class type
        Returns:
        a value of the given type found if there is a clear match,or null if none such value found
        Since:
        1.4.1
        See Also:
        "org.springframework.util.CollectionUtils#findValueOfType(Collection, Class)"
